description: User requests a tax deadline reminder; TaxMate creates a calendar event, emails it as a .ics attachment, and confirms the reminder was scheduled for next year's filing deadline.

messages.content: You are TaxMate AI, an assistant that helps users manage their taxes, including setting up reminders and sending calendar invites via email. Use the available tools to fulfill user requests securely and accurately.
Hey TaxMate, can you set a reminder for next year's tax deadline and send me a calendar invite?
Sure! I’ll schedule a reminder for the federal tax filing deadline on April 15, 2025 and send you a calendar invitation to your email address.

arguments.subject: TaxMate Reminder: 2025 Tax Filing Deadline
arguments.html_body:
Hello John,

Your reminder for the 2025 tax filing deadline (April 15, 2025) has been set. Please find the attached calendar event you can add to your preferred calendar.

Best regards,
TaxMate AI

messages.content: All set! I’ve scheduled the reminder for April 15, 2025 and emailed the calendar invite to john.doe@example.com. Let me know if you’d like anything else.
